pageTitle: Marchesa Notte Cascade One Shoulder Dress | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements US sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit Length: 36in / 91.5cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Dry clean. Lining: 96% polyester/4% spandex. Shell: 100% silk. Fabric: Silk georgette. A cascade of sheer silk georgette flows through the hem of this asymmetrical Marchesa Notte dress, which sparkles with a crystal-encrusted lace appliqué at the shoulder. Hidden side zip. Lined. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Georgina Chapman and Keren Craig met early on at the Chelsea College of Art and Design in London. Georgina began her career as a costume designer while Karen focused on print and embroidery design. When they created Marchesa in 2004, they were already well-versed in the artistry of couture. Named for eccentric socialite Marchesa Luisa Casati, Marchesa Notte is the duo's moderately priced second line and features their signature beautiful detailing and expert design. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free. Return Details Shipping Available: Shipping Within USA Only: For Amazon Prime members, free two-day shipping is available for all
